#summary CVS Source Management Extension
The *cvs* extension provides a loader to handle source checked out of CVS repositories.

= Loader =

The syntax of the loader is
{{{
cvs REPOSITORY MODULE DIRECTORY
}}}

For a simple checkout, add a line to `SOURCES` like
{{{
SOURCES=" ...
	cvs :pserver:anonymous@cvs.savannah.gnu.org:/sources/hello hello .
... "
}}}
